body.p:
Morehead Ky Feb 10th 1862
Hon. L W Andrews
D Sir

Francis Purvis James Purvis & Hiram Purvis have each been fined $3.33 1/3 cts for a breach of the peace. The affair occured at the election There was no harm done in the fight, and the times are hard and it is hard to get money to pay debts & those men are as you know quiet peaceable men therefore we desire you to use your influence with the Gov. to have siad fines released and you will confer a favor on them and your humble Servants
